"Controls: Touchscreen: Fire D-Pad/Trackball: Left/Right: Angle Up/Down: Power Center: Fire
Scoring - Random game type: Number of targets on screen by the power of the number of active target hits by the specific projectile.
Whether you like Cannon or not, please rate it and leave a constructive comment.
As with everything I create for the public, I am open to suggestions, bug reports, questions, comments, etc. I am very easy to contact, more communication mediums are listed on my website. A list of known issues is available on the Cannon website.
It is very important if you report a bug that you contact me in a way that I can reply in case I need more information. A Market comment won't work.
Many thanks to the testers and helpers! HotShotS SuM_WuN"
